episode_summary: This episode features facts about Anne of Green Gables and a giant potato sculpture, a cowboy lassoing a plane, using mirrors to attract puffins, and the effectiveness of trash talk in sports.

facts.fact: Anne of Green Gables is from the same island as the world's largest potato sculpture.
In 1952, a cowboy successfully lassoed a plane as it flew past his house.
One of the best ways to trick puffins to a new nesting ground is with mirrors, because they like to be in groups and can't tell the difference between a puffin and the reflection of a puffin.
Trash talk works better on darts players than shot putters.
